synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried under irradiant lamp for half day

additional_information.TGA_analysis: One discrete weight loss (2.98%) occurred at 90 ~158°C, corresponding to the removal of three molecule waters per formula unit (3.09% calculated) while there is no weight loss observed at the temperature range of 158 to 300°C, suggesting the polymer is stable up to 300°C.
additional_information.XRD_analysis: The XRD powdered pattern of MOF 1 is consistent with that of single crystal simulated pattern, confirming the phase obtained is a pure compound.
additional_information.SHG_response: The SHG response of MOF 1 ranges from ca. 2 to 10 times higher than that of KDP.
additional_information.electric_hysteresis_loop_measurement: The ferroelectric property of single crystal was measured in a Radiant Technologies’ Precision II ferroelectric tester. The single crystal double faces were covered with conducting Ag-glue. The applied electric field should increase gradually from small voltages to high voltages to see which voltages can reach the saturation polarization in P-E curve. One sample will take two hours to try to reach the ideal hysteresis loop. Ps=5.7µC/cm2 for MOF 1 without water and Ps=5.8µC/cm2 for MOF 1 with water at fixed frequency 12Hz.
